english: Expressions
chinese: 释义

english: seem to diminish
chinese: 似乎在缩小

english: cultural elements become a regular part of daily life
chinese: 文化元素成为日常生活的一部分

english: regardless of their nationality
chinese: 不论他们的国籍

english: a diverse range of foods
chinese: 各种各样的食物

english: gather at the same international restaurants
chinese: 聚在同样的国际餐厅

english: share meals that once seemed exotic
chinese: 分享曾经看似异国风味的食物

english: now a familiar part of our routine
chinese: 现在是我们日常生活中熟悉的一部分

english: watch international movies with my peers
chinese: 和我的同伴一起看国际电影

english: discuss similar themes and emotions
chinese: 讨论相似的主题和情感

english: from different backgrounds
chinese: 来自不同背景

english: shared experiences
chinese: 共同的经历

english: adopt similar tastes and interests
chinese: 采纳了相似的品味和兴趣

english: make us feel more alike despite our different origins
chinese: 尽管我们的出身不同，仍让我们感觉更相似

english: access information about distinct cultures
chinese: 获取有关不同文化的信息

english: learn from each other
chinese: 互相学习

english: result in a reduction in these differences
chinese: 导致这些差异的减少

english: limited knowledge about American culture
chinese: 对美国文化的了解有限

english: due to the long distance between our countries
chinese: 由于我们两国之间的长距离

english: their eating habits, clothing styles, and daily routines
chinese: 他们的饮食习惯、穿衣风格和日常作息

english: with the advent of the internet
chinese: 随着互联网的到来

english: access to a wide range of American movies and TV shows
chinese: 接触到各种各样的美国电影和电视节目

english: adopt western habits
chinese: 采用了西方的习惯

english: cultural exchanges have made our lifestyles more similar
chinese: 文化交流使我们的生活方式更加相似
